attributes.action: Reduce or take away benefit from people who show no itention of working
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: or who have children as a career move to obtain more money from the state.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reduce or take away benefit from people who show no itention of working."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12191.asp

Prime Minister's Office
